feed.title: Cleanuperr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: v1.5.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix patterns being loaded for disabled arrs by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/80
  • Fix multiple runs on queue cleaner when download cleaner is enabled by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/90
  • Fix notifications when poster is not found by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/89
  • Restrict max strikes to a minimum value by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/87
  • Update docs by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/88

Full Changelog: https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/compare/v1.5.11...v1.5.12

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: v1.5.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add option to explicitly disable the download client by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/93

Full Changelog: https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/compare/v1.5.12...v1.5.13

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: v1.5.14
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add base path support for arrs by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/96
  • Add download client customizable url base by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/43
  • Fix Deluge service crashing when download is not found by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/97

Full Changelog: https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/compare/v1.5.13...v1.5.14

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: v1.5.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix qBit queued items being processed by @Flaminel in https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/pull/102

Full Changelog: https://github.com/flmorg/cleanuperr/compare/v1.5.14...v1.5.15

entry.title: New release for Cleanuperr: v1.5.16
